v8:item.v8:content: Set the calculated totals period for all registers with enabled totals. For accumulation registers - %1. For accounting registers - %2.
Enable the totals mode for all registers which have totals use disabled.
Rebuild and fill aggregates for all registers with the aggregates mode and usage enabled.
Calculate the list of optimal aggregates for all registers which have aggregates set in Designer.
Shows whether totals are used by this register.
Which mode is used by the register - totals or aggregates
Shows whether the current totals are used by this register.
Shows whether aggregates are used for register.
Aggregates by registers name and mode
BF='Total data is used'; BT='Aggregate data is used'
BF='Total data is used'; BT='Aggregate data is used'
Aggregates by registers group date and effect
Expected reduction of average request execution time using aggregates
Estimated size of the aggregate table.
Set calculated totals period for all registers
Enable the use of totals for all registers that had this feature disabled.
Calculate optimal aggregates for all registers
